# üìã Create GitHub Issues Manually

Since GitHub CLI might not be installed, here are instructions to create issues manually.

## üî• Must-Have Components

### 1. Slider
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Slider&labels=component,enhancement,must-have

**Details:**
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 2-3 hours
- Dependencies: `@radix-ui/react-slider`

---

### 2. Combobox
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Combobox&labels=component,enhancement,must-have

**Details:**
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 3-4 hours
- Dependencies: `cmdk` or `@radix-ui/react-combobox`

---

### 3. Alert & AlertDialog
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Alert%20%26%20AlertDialog&labels=component,enhancement,must-have

**Details:**
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 2-3 hours
- Dependencies: `@radix-ui/react-alert-dialog`

---

### 4. Command Palette
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Command%20Palette&labels=component,enhancement,must-have

**Details:**
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 4-5 hours
- Dependencies: `cmdk`

---

### 5. Data Table Block
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=block.md&title=%5BBlock%5D%20Data%20Table%20Block&labels=block,enhancement,must-have

**Details:**
- Priority: Must-Have
- Effort: 4-5 hours
- Components: Table, Pagination, Checkbox

---

## ‚≠ê High Priority Components

### 6. Hover Card
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Hover%20Card&labels=component,enhancement,high-priority

### 7. Context Menu
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Context%20Menu&labels=component,enhancement,high-priority

### 8. Pagination
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Pagination&labels=component,enhancement,high-priority

### 9. Sheet/Sidebar
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Sheet&labels=component,enhancement,high-priority

### 10. Navigation Menu
**URL:** https://github.com/blazejrzepa/fragment-ui/issues/new?template=component.md&title=%5BComponent%5D%20Navigation%20Menu&labels=component,enhancement,high-priority

---

## Quick Steps

1. Click the URL for each component
2. Fill in the template with details from `V1.1.0_ROADMAP.md`
3. Select appropriate labels
4. Submit issue
5. Repeat for all components

---

## Or Use GitHub CLI

If you have `gh` installed:
```bash
# See .github/create_issues.sh for script
# Or create individually using gh issue create
```
